title: Ticket #710: condor_power_state is not compiled under Windows
description: The Visual Studio project file for power_state doesn't work so it is not compiled with the rest of the solution.
remarks:
2009-Sep-02 14:59:45 by ziliang:
I've modified the project file so that it stops complaining about some linking options mismatch. It also appears that the code in simple_arg.h/.cpp in the c++ utils folder was never compiled under Windows. I've also added it to the cpp_util project file and now condor_power_state compiles and links correctly.
check_ins: 2009-Sep-02 15:18   Check-in [15604]: Get condor_power_state to compile, which required adding two files to condor_c++_util that for some odd reason were not included in the Windows build. Ticket #710 (By Ziliang Guo )
creator: ziliang
